introduction.im: and I am a Full Stack Web Developer

aboutmeParagraph.first: Hi there! I'm Mustapha Taibi, a 21-year-old computer science student with a passion for web development and new technologies. I specialize in full-stack development and have mastered various JavaScript frameworks such as Next.js, Node.js, React.js, and Angular.js. I am also proficient in TypeScript and have a strong background in creating websites that require real-time data synchronization, utilizing technologies like Socket.IO and Node Schedule.
aboutmeParagraph.second: With a high school background in management and economics, I strive to blend my business knowledge with my technical expertise to effectively manage projects. I conduct market research to identify product issues or areas for improvement and propose solutions to address these challenges.
aboutmeParagraph.third: I am always eager to enhance my knowledge and skills. Currently, I am expanding my expertise into mobile development and exploring the integration of AI into my projects.
aboutmeParagraph.forth: I hope you enjoy exploring my projects. If you are interested in hiring me or would like more details, please feel free to contact me via LinkedIn or GitHub using the links below!

projectDescription.Tuni-Auctions: An online auction platform built around exploring the local market, identifying its issues and introducting new and innovate solutions to help revive the market and make the bidding experience much more enjoyable.
projectDescription.Dar Seranity: Tunisian online rental platform, it manages the full spectrum of renting functionalities like handling home listings and requests for home viewings, monthly rent payment and tracking, and tenants move out.
projectDescription.Tuni-Work: Tunisian online freelance platform, it takes care of job listings, freelancer browsing and applications, project acceptance, task tracking within projects, secure payments, and a reporting system for dispute resolution with employers.
